mapper.update:
update cfg_dispatch_model_config
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dispatch_model_id = #{dispatchModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
belong_object_type = #{belongObjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
belong_object_id = #{belongObjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equipment_request = #{equipmentRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_request = #{otherRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dispatch_description = #{dispatchDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
backup_device_request = #{backupDeviceRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
suggest_price = #{suggestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
suggest_unit = #{suggestUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_fixed_price = #{flagFixedPrice,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_avaliable = #{flagAvaliable,jdbcType=BIT},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dispatch_model_request = #{dispatchModelRequest,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
upload_file_name = #{uploadFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_file_url = #{uploadFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_auto_commit = #{flagAutoCommit,jdbcType=BIT},
complete_profile_template_name = #{completeProfileTemplateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
complete_profile_template_url = #{completeProfileTemplateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT model.id, model.company_id companyId, model.project_id projectId, model.model_name modelName, model.dispatch_model_id dispatchModelId, model.dispatch_model_request dispatchModelRequest, model.belong_object_type belongObjectType, model.belong_object_id belongObjectId, model.equipment_request equipmentRequest, model.other_request otherRequest, model.dispatch_description dispatchDescription, model.backup_device_request backupDeviceRequest, model.suggest_price suggestPrice, model.suggest_unit suggestUnit, model.flag_fixed_price flagFixedPrice, model.flag_deleted flagDeleted, model.flag_avaliable flagAvaliable, model.create_person createPerson, model.create_time createTime, model.update_person updatePerson, model.update_time updateTime, model.upload_file_name uploadFileName, model.upload_file_url uploadFileUrl, model.complete_profile_template_url completeProfileTemplateUrl, model.complete_profile_template_name completeProfileTemplateName, model.flag_auto_commit flagAutoCommit, com.company_name companyName, pro.project_name projectName FROM cfg_dispatch_model_config model LEFT JOIN dmi_company_info com on com.id = model.company_id LEFT JOIN pjt_project pro on pro.id = model.project_id WHERE model.flag_deleted = 0 AND model.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT model.create_person id, suer.username createPerson FROM cfg_dispatch_model_config model LEFT JOIN sys_company_users suer ON model.create_person = suer.id WHERE model.create_person IN ( SELECT sys.id FROM sys_company_users sys INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_company_users WHERE id = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND flag_deleted = 0 ) sys1 ON sys.act_type = sys1.act_type AND sys.act_Object_id = sys1.act_Object_id ) AND model.flag_deleted = 0

SELECT
FROM cfg_dispatch_model_config WHERE flag_deleted = 0 AND flag_avaliable = 1 AND project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM cfg_dispatch_model_config WHERE flag_deleted = 0 AND project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
